body_html: Note that this code doesn't work even without gradients_function, because the operator ** isn't defined for python lists. If you convert your arguments to tensors using tf.convert_to_tensor or tf.constant it should be ok.
body_text: Note that this code doesn't work even without gradients_function, because the operator ** isn't defined for python lists. If you convert your arguments to tensors using tf.convert_to_tensor or tf.constant it should be ok.
body: Note that this code doesn't work even without gradients_function, because the operator ** isn't defined for python lists. If you convert your arguments to tensors using tf.convert_to_tensor or tf.constant it should be ok.
